product_name: Salomon SNS Propulse RC2 Classic Cross-Country Ski Bindings
long_description: The Salomon SNS Propulse RC2 Classic cross-country ski bindings are very light and have a low profile for excellent energy transmission, an efficient kick and a good feel for the snow.
short_description: The Salomon SNS Propulse RC2 Classic cross-country ski bindings are very light and have a low profile for excellent energy transmission, an efficient kick and a good feel for the snow.
